page.title: 02 RAINFORD HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: This school is a co-educational comp. It has about 1700 pupils,coming,by bus, from Eccleston and Billinge,and others from Rainford.There are 99 full-time teachers and 7 part-time.There are 6 office staff and 3 lab.technicians,as well as 12 cooks & 14 dinner-ladies. There are after school/dinner-time clubs.Competitions are also organised between the 4 large houses.There is also a new 6th form block,built to accomodate the 200 senior pupils. The night school provides 37 activi- ties on the premises of RHS.There are 9 sports offered,dancing,arts courses and languages.There are approx.555 students during the whole year.The age range is from 18-70 years.The courses consist of ten 2-hour lessons costing 9 pounds 20p. Exams are taken at the end of the courses and are accepted as job qualifications.
